name: Klever Internet Investments Ltd
overview:
Klever Internet Investments Limited is a special purpose vehicle established by Klever Asset Management in order to gain diversified exposure on internet technology markets by investing in both early stage and well-funded companies with significant growth potential, strong management teams and clear cash-generating business-models. Deal sizes and terms are being set on case by case basis with no strict limits.

Klever Asset Management is one of the largest Russian private investors with total assets under management exceeding US$1bn in value.
